# body

**Instance Property**

The composition of content that comprise the keyframes.

## Declaration

```swift
@KeyframesBuilder<Self.Value> var body: Self.Body { get }
```

## Creating a keyframe

- **Body**: The type of keyframes representing the body of this type.
- **Value**: The type of value animated by this keyframes type
